channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 在大流行病期间，全美各地的百万富翁都搬到了天堂谷，使这个亚利桑那州中部小镇成为美国最昂贵的沙漠房地产所在地。"现在这里是一个不同的世界。
item.description:
Millionaires from across the U.S. moved to Paradise Valley during the pandemic, making the central Arizona town home to the priciest desert real estate in the U.S. “It’s a different world here now.” https://t.co/bvMHqYtOlM https://t.co/bvMHqYtOlM

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 特朗普赢得了密歇根州的共和党初选，这是他在今年的主要提名竞选中取得的第五次连胜，也给处于劣势的海莉的竞选带来了最新的打击。
item.description:
Trump won Michigan’s GOP primary, marking his fifth straight victory in this year’s major nominating contests and delivering the latest blow to Haley’s underdog bid https://t.co/l7337A1AKb

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 纽约游骑兵队前锋马特-雷姆普（Matt Rempe）是冰球运动早期更暴力时代的回光返照。在他参加的前五场 NHL 比赛中，他已经打了三场架，而且他对此乐此不疲。
item.description:
New York Rangers forward Matt Rempe is a throwback to an earlier, more violent era of hockey. He has gotten in three fights in his first five NHL games—and he’s loving it. https://t.co/E2qlcfMmS7

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 我们的专栏作家试驾特斯拉 Cybertruck 的规则很简单：没有规则。以下是他在 48 小时试驾过程中的对与错。
item.description:
The rules for our columnist’s test drive of Tesla’s Cybertruck were simple: no rules. Here’s what went right—and wrong—during his 48-hour test drive. https://t.co/GZgRSh6FPi https://t.co/GZgRSh6FPi

item.title: Kaia Gerber 深知作为 nepo 宝宝的好处。"她说："我个人非常清楚这对我的好处，我绝不会说任何负面的话。
item.description:
Kaia Gerber is aware of the benefits of being a nepo baby. “I personally am very aware of all the wonderful things it has done for me, and I would never ever say anything negative about it,” she says. https://t.co/7B1gjCohvR https://t.co/7B1gjCohvR

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：对德国建制派来说，最苦涩的药丸可能就是意识到，在德国面临的最重要问题上，唐纳德-特朗普是对的，而他们错了，@wrmead 写道
item.description:

item.title: 科学家们希望通过在海洋中释放化学物质、向云层喷洒盐水以及向天空发送反射粒子来冷却地球。批评者警告说，这将带来意想不到的后果。
item.description:
Scientists want to cool the planet by releasing chemicals in the ocean, spraying saltwater into clouds and sending reflective particles into the sky. Critics warn of unintended consequences. https://t.co/8GU1VAfzxG https://t.co/8GU1VAfzxG

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024

item.title: 十年前，世界上人口最多的 10 个国家中只有印度有一位 70 岁或 70 岁以上的领导人。如今，有八个国家的领导人都是 70 岁或以上。"潮人 "总统和总理热潮的背后是什么？
item.description:
A decade ago, just one of the world’s 10 most populous countries, India, had a leader who was 70 or older. Today, eight do.

What’s behind the boom in boomer presidents and prime ministers? https://t.co/uMvUCtLieS https://t.co/uMvUCtLieS

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 28, 2024
